content: versa cowl instructions cast on 110 stitches place a beginning of the round marker cowl will be worked in the round joining in first round with mc purl 3 rounds with mc knit 1 round broken seed stitch pattern round 1 with cc k1 p1 round 2 with mc k materials round 3 with cc p1 k1 round 4 with mc k yarns 1 skein each of 2 colors round 5 with cc k1 p1 malabrigo rios 210yds/100g round 6 with mc k round 7 with cc p1 k1 needles us8 24 circular round 8 with mc k round 9 with cc k1 p1 notions stitch marker & tapestry needle round 10 with mc k round 11 with cc p1 k1 size & gauge round 12 with mc k round 13 with cc k1 p1 flat 12 5 x 17 5 round 14 with mc k round 15 with cc p1 k1 18 sts = 4 in stockinette abbreviations repeat rounds 1 15 of broken seed stitch 3 more times switching mc and cc each repeat repeat 2 begins with mc k=knit repeat 3 begins with cc repeat 4 begins with mc p=purl mc= main color with cc knit 1 round cc= contrasting color with cc purl 4 rounds striped pattern with mc knit 3 rounds with cc knit 3 rounds repeat above 6 rounds 8 more times for a total of 54 row repeat above row as needed for length we found our row gauge was larger in stockinette stitch with mc knit 1 round with mc purl 3 rounds bind off weave in ends with a tapestry needle ©2020 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting emailing this pattern to others or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited darnknitanyway com 651 342 1386
